english: On a dark desert highway, cool wind in my hair.
chinese: 行驶在漆黑的沙漠公路，凉风吹过发间。

english: Warm smell of colitas, rising up through the air.
chinese: 空气中飘来大麻的温热气息。

english: Up ahead in the distance, I saw a shimmering light.
chinese: 远处，我看到闪烁的灯光。

english: My head grew heavy and my sight grew dim,​
chinese: 我的头越来越沉，视线模糊，

english: I had to stop for the night.
There she stood in the doorway,​
And I was thinking to myself,​
"This could be Heaven or this could be Hell."
chinese: “这里可能是天堂，也可能是地狱。”

english: Then she lit up a candle and she showed me the way.
There were voices down the corridor,​
I thought I heard them say...
Such a lovely place, such a lovely face.
chinese: 如此美好的地方，如此美丽的面容。

english: Plenty of room at the Hotel California,​
Any time of year, you can find it here."
